attributes.action: not introduce a further tax on rubbish disposal.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
whilst understanding the need to recycle it is wrong however well meaning to force a further tax on the british public this tax will peanalise people with large families and low income and will result in increased levels of fly tipping. 
We all already pay an excessive tax burden and now is the time to say enough is enough we work hard for our pay and we would like to enjoy the benifit for ourselves not hand it over to this wasteful government.
